content: The Auspicious Lantern is one of the many Curios items you can find in Black Myth: Wukong. Like the rest of these items, once found, it can be equipped from the Equipment menu.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Auspicious_Lantern.md', within the main section titled 'Auspicious Lantern'.
The content is as follows:
The Auspicious Lantern is one of the many Curios items you can find in Black Myth: Wukong. Like the rest of these items, once found, it can be equipped from the Equipment menu.
